summary: An ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 40858, entitled: "An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 44, T. I. McKinney's Central Seattle Addition, being the alley between Twenty-third Avenue South and Twenty-fourth Avenue South, from Plum Street to Hill Street, all in accordance with Resolution No. 6425, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", approved the 5th day of May, 1920.
